item.description:
We will have a planning meeting for the 4th Congressional District April 5 Republican Caucus at Laura Creedon's home - 33 Egmont St #3, Brookline at 7pm, Thursday Feb. 21.

Laura can be reached 617-347-9038.

This is the first district planning meeting for anyone who would like to run as a delgate or help to elect delegates to the National Convention in September for Ron Paul. The rules that govern the caucus are available here: http://files.meetup.c... Please review them before the meeting if you can. The Republican National Convention rules are also available in our files section.

You can locate which congressional district you are in here: http://www.wheredoivo...
Scroll to the bottom for "District Representatives-Congressional".

The 4th Congressional District covers a wide area from Boston south and includes the following cities and towns:

DISTRICT NO. 4

BRISTOL COUNTY

Acushnet
Berkley
Dartmouth
Dighton
Fairhaven
FALL RIVER - Wd. 4, Pct. C; Wd. 5, Pct. C; Wd. 6, Pct. A; Wd. 7; Wd. 8, Pcts. A, B, C; Wd. 9
Freetown
Mansfield
NEW BEDFORD
Norton
Raynham
TAUNTON
Westport

MIDDLESEX COUNTY

NEWTON
Sherborn

NORFOLK COUNTY

Brookline
Dover
Foxborough
Millis
Norfolk
Sharon
Wellesley

PLYMOUTH COUNTY

Halifax
Lakeville
Marion
Mattapoisett
Middleborough
Rochester
Wareham

If you reside within the district please attend the meeting next Thursday, Feb. 21 at 7 pm.
item.name: 4th Congressional District Republican April 5 Caucus Planning Meeting
